articles.description: England stalwart has resumed bowling and his research tells him that a lack of express pace may not cost his side in Australia
articles.content: Stuart Broad has had a lot of time on his hands these past two months, while he has been nursing the torn calf muscle that meant he played in only the first Test of the series with India. Judging by … [+3703 chars]

articles.title: World Superbike San Juan, Argentina - Superpole Qualifying Results - Crash
articles.description: Results from Superpole qualifying, round 12 of the 2021 World Superbike Championship in San Juan, Argentina.
articles.content:
Scott Redding has claimed his first WorldSBK pole of 2021 after yellow flags cost pre-session favourite Toprak Razgatlioglu the chance to challenge the Ducati riders time.
